long_description: With windproof soft-shell fabric and an athletic fit, the women's Marmot Fusion Jacket reminds you it's possible to be comfortable while training in wet and windy weather. Body and sleeves are stretchy windproof and water-resistant soft-shell fabric with a moisture-wicking backing to keep you comfortable during exercise. Zippered hand pockets; internal zippered chest pocket with headphone port. Drawcord hem and elasticized cuffs seal in warmth. Thumbholes extend cuffs to keep wrists warm. The women's Marmot Fusion Jacket features reflective highlights to increase visibility. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Closeout.
short_description: With windproof soft-shell fabric and an athletic fit, the women's Marmot Fusion Jacket reminds you it's possible to be comfortable while training in wet and windy weather.
